entities.name: kitchen
entities.description: The kitchen is mentioned as a place where house-elves work.

entities.name: house-elves
entities.description: House-elves are mentioned as working in the kitchens and being looked after by Harry.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as giving instructions to Kreacher and making arrangements for Buckbeak.

entities.name: Kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who is given instructions by Harry.

entities.name: Hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as the place where Kreacher will work in the kitchens.

entities.name: Buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriff who is looked after by Hagrid and later becomes Harry's responsibility.

entities.name: Hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as looking after Buckbeak since Sirius died.

entities.name: Sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as having died and leaving Hagrid to look after Buckbeak.

relationships.description: Harry gives instructions to Kreacher about working in the kitchens at Hogwarts.
Harry becomes responsible for taking care of Buckbeak.
Hagrid looks after Buckbeak since Sirius died.
Kreacher will work in the kitchens at Hogwarts.
